sections.title: Verse 1
content: Behold among men none is like Him,
King of kings and Lord of lords;

sections.title: Chorus
content: He was born in humble manger,
Yet He rules from highest throne;
All the world shall bow before Him,
At the name of Jesus Christ.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Let the earth rejoice and sing,
For the Lord is come again;
Peace and joy shall fill the nations,
When He rules in every heart.
